DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Online Educational Module Before Carrier Genetic Screening Persons Ashkenazi Jewish Descent .
DOC.detailed_description: In Montreal , individual Ashkenazi Jewish descent eligible carrier screen three genetic condition : Tay-Sachs disease , Canavan disease , familial dysautonomia . The investigator develop new website educate person Ashkenazi Jewish ancestry increase risk child genetic condition , genetic testing investigator offer . This study aim pilot website find whether effective learn investigator improve . Specifically , investigator measure knowledge acquisition , level anxiety , degree satisfaction experience . Participants study assigned one two condition : 1 . Standard in-person genetic counselling session learn inheritance Ashkenazi Jewish genetic condition genetic testing . Participants fill two short questionnaire , one one genetic counselling session . These questionnaire assess demographic information , knowledge regard three genetic condition list , feeling anxiety level , e-health literacy , overall satisfaction . They give requisition form undergo blood draw genetic test Montreal General Hospital test centre . 2 . Use web-based pre-test genetic counselling tool learn inheritance Ashkenazi Jewish genetic condition genetic test . They fill two short questionnaire , one , one use web-based tool . These questionnaire similar condition , except also question regard utility web-based tool way improve tool . Participants electronically send requisition form undergo blood draw genetic test Montreal General Hospital test centre . In condition , genetic test result communicate telephone available . Participants ' genetic test result use way study .
DOC.criteria: At least one grandparent Ashkenazi Jewish descent Access computer home computer literate Participant participant 's partner pregnant time study Family history Ashkenazi Jewish genetic condition
